member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_BINARY_DATA
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_BINARY_DATA structure contains binary data used in Local Security Authority forest trust operations.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_BINARY_DATA.Length
member.summary: Size of the structure in bytes.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_BINARY_DATA.Buffer
member.summary: Pointer to an array of type UCHAR that contains the binary data. The buffer can contain at most 128 KB of data.
